item.title: Nifty Prediction Today – September 4, 2025: Nifty futures: Likely to gain further

review.headline_rewrite: Nifty Prediction Today – September 4, 2025: Nifty futures: Likely to gain further
bullets: Nifty Metal (down 0.5 per cent) and Nifty Oil & Gas (down 0.4 per cent) are the top losers.
As the contract has rallied past the hurdle at 24,900, the likelihood of today’s intraday trend staying bullish is high.
In case the contract falls from the current level of 24,980, it can find support at 24,900.
